thread.title: Red River Rivalry weekend is here, get the lowdown on what's going on around DFW this weekend
thread.title_full: Red River Rivalry weekend is here, get the lowdown on what's going on around DFW this weekend | Dallas Morning News

author: SportsDayDFW.com
title: Red River Rivalry weekend is here, get the lowdown on what's going on around DFW this weekend
text:
THURSDAY
Dallas OU Club Happy Hour : 6:30 p.m. at Sherlock's, 9100 N. Central Expressway. Admission is free. All OU Club of Dallas Members can win a chance to purchase game tickets, but must be present to win. See www.ouclubofdallas.com for information.
FRIDAY
28th Annual Get Teed Off at OU Golf Tournament: 8 a.m .at Firewheel Golf Park, 600 W. Campbell Rd. in Garland. Cost is $300 and benefits the Dallas Texas Exes Scholarship Fund. For more information, please contact Quinn Devery & Matt Garcia at golf@dallastexasexes.org.
Red River Rivalry Pep Rally: 1p.m.-4 p.m. at University Co-op, 7700 W. Northwest Hwy in Dallas. See Bevo, the UT Spirit Squad and meet former UT quarterback Peter Gardere.
Texes Exes Bash Befire the Clash: 7 p.m. at Dodie's Reef, 2821 Greenville Ave. in Dallas. Admission is free and valet is complimentary. For more information, please contact Jennifer Parker at jennparker19@gmail.com.
The Beat Texas Party: 8 pm. at the Hilton Lincoln Centre. Tickets are $30, $25 for OU Club of Dallas members. Appearances by The Pride of Oklahoma Marching Band, Sooner Spirit Squads, Ruf/Neks and mascots. For information, see www.ouclubofdallas.com .
SATURDAY
Dallas Texas Exes Pre-Game Tailgate: 7 a.m. at the State Fair of Texas at Fair Park, Inside Gate 5 at Grand Ave in the Fairgrounds (between Classic Car Corral and Natural Science Museum). Admission is free. For more information, contact Jeff Duchin and David Murrell at texastailgate@dallastexasexes.org
Dallas Texas Exes Texas-OU game watching party: 11 a.m. at Dodie's Reef, 2821 Greenville Ave. in Dallas. Texas Exes members are eligible for a door prize. For information, contact John Page and E.J. Chavez at gw@dallastexasexes.org
On Twitter:
 @SportsDayDFW
